timeline.bodyText:
We have race condition here.
Timeline:

we initialize watchDog and call subscribe
watch dog run new thread, read ZK and call handle()
zkStateTracker still and handle() fails because of NPE
We initialize zkStateTracker in main thread
timeline.author: niksv

timeline.bodyText:
maybe we should set empty state before START? It could be race condition.

script sends signal START
FL receives this signal, handles it and sets state to 0
scrips sets state to ""
